message: Let's split it evenly!  It's a fair start.
Let's be practical, Alice. I'm feeling more ambitious this time. How about a 60/40 split in my favor?
I'm willing to compromise a little, but I think a 55/45 split is more fair. Let's not let this go on forever!
Time is running out, Alice!  I'll take a slightly larger share, 65/35.  Don't let this opportunity slip away.
Okay, I'm starting to feel the pressure of the clock ticking. Let's make this a 45/55 split. It's the best we can do before the money dwindles further!
